alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:19PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Idaho and central Ravalli Counties through 300 PM MDT/200 PM PDT/... At 219 PM MDT/119 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles west of Darby to 20 miles west of Gibbonsville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Darby, Victor, Conner, Woodside, Pinesdale, Sula, Grantsdale, Charlos Heights, Corvallis, Como and Bell Crossing. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 5 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
